title: Ticket #3504: Negotiator can run past NEGOTIATOR_MAX_TIME_PER_SUBMITTER
description: The 7.9.4 negotiator only looks at NEGOTIATOR_MAX_TIME_PER_SUBMITTER at the start of each negotiation cycle. So if an individual cycle takes longer than this limit, the limit is effectively ignored.
remarks:
Documented in version history as is appropriate.

2014-Mar-21 09:23:46 by tannenba:
While version history was documented, the documentation that described what this knob does in section 3.3 was not changed. Fixed this in commit [39681] for release v8.0.7/v8.1.5.
